Indian Economy.title: Israeli hostage families call for nationwide strike as Netanyahu prepares to escalate Gaza war
Indian Economy.summary: Organisers said the strike would begin as a grassroots effort, with private companies and citizens taking the day off to disrupt the economy.

Indian Economy.title: Chhattisgarh’s latest scheme aims to get stray cattle off the roads
Indian Economy.summary: The Indian Express reported last year that 404 people had died and 129 were seriously injured after the vehicles they were travelling in crashed into animals, mostly cattle, in Chhattisgarh over a period of five and a half years.

Indian Economy.title: From the Opinions Editor: Viksit Bharat cannot be built on broken ecosystems. Uttarakhand flash floods, waterlogged Delhi are warnings
Indian Economy.summary: It’s both a political and knowledge-related imperative. In a world challenged by global warming, refashioning the ecology-economy link has as much significance as that of syncing skills with the demands of new cybertech, AI and robotics

Indian Economy.title: Nitin Pai: The Indian economy can be shielded from Trump’s tariffs
Indian Economy.summary: The geopolitics of it may be a bigger worry than its economics. New Delhi must resist knee-jerk responses, wait for a good time to repair relations with the US and adopt structural reforms to drive economic growth.

Indian Economy.title: Trump’s trade jolt should spark off reforms in India’s energy sector
Indian Economy.summary: Economic resilience demands a competitive economy. India’s energy sector could play a key role in this quest if we optimize policy to reduce both India’s cost base and carbon emissions. Here’s what should be done.
